string.text: FOUL! Your opponent was fighting outside the joust. {?OPPONENT_GENDER}He{?}She{\?} has been disqualified!
You cannot change the leader of your own party or disband it
Pawns travel toward the opponent's home-tile. Upon reaching the last tile, they will move back towards their own home-tile. Enemy pawns can be captured along the way.
How much? How much money? Be quick.[ib:hip][rf:convo_angry]
Our plan is to form a defensive line.
On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, you heard of a conspiracy working in the shadows to forge the enemies of the Empire into an alliance.
You have arrived at {SETTLEMENT} to raid it. Some of the residents have gathered to resist you. Raiding this village will cause a war with the {KINGDOM}.
Capturing is done by surrounding an opposing pawn from both sides with your own pawns.{newline}Pawns can also be captured by blocking them against the center tile. This works for both players.
Open the gates and sally out!
Donate to Troops{newline}You will not be able to undo this action.
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} are screening against enemy moving behind our back.
Defenders sally out to attack {BESIEGER_LEADER.NAME}'s siege camp
You need to be in the same location as the character in order to talk to them
Preparations seem to be underway for a tournament
Our plan is to try and hold this narrow pass.
After this prisoner gains {CONFORMITY_AMOUNT} conformity, one more prisoner will be available for recruitment.
Unable to use the clipboard text as body properties key!
Well now. Let's see what sort of fly has stumbled into our web.[rf:convo_mocking_revenge]
You can not perform this action while you are imprisoned.
Gain {REQUIRED_XP_FOR_NEXT_LEVEL} xp for this skill by using it to level it up
Our troops are falling back to the castle.
On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, the {FORMAL_NAME} was destroyed. It will not fulfil its destiny to {?PLAYER_WANTS_RESTORE}restore{?}destroy{\?} the Empire as you had hoped.
So be it... As my father says, a journey's not worthy of the name if you don't get to kill anyone.
Pull back now or take command of your forces!
Heh. You made a wise choice. Come back this way and we can do business again.[ib:closed][rf:convo_bemused]
{ISSUE_NAME}: Your troops failed to resolve the matter.
You chose well, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. My lads know how to keep their word and earn their pay.[ib:convo_approving]
You are trapped by enemies. But your men are in no condition to fight.
Good. Sometimes it's better to shear the sheep than eat them.
Arrr.. You'd best not be toying with us.
Cannot kick family members from clan.
You can not perform this action while you are in a siege.
Gain a total of {SKILL_LEVEL_FOR_LEVEL_UP} skill points to level up this character.
There is already an unresolved decision on this settlement.
You've constructed a barrier against your opponent, but have fewer pawns left. You lost the game!
On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, you heard rumors of a secret pact being forged between the rival imperial factions so that they can combine their forces against the enemies of the empire.
FOUL! No hitting your opponent's horse. You have been disqualified!
I am glad to hear that. Killing is thirsty work for us too.
A player wins if his opponent can't make any more jumps (captures).
You are on the wrong side!
Though it seems most people are managing to get by, many seem angry, and you overhear a few passers-by muttering that their patience is giving out. You sense something may be stirring.
As you attempt to force the villagers to give you goods, some of the residents gather to resist you.
Stop there, in the name of the free men of the mountain! Now, what have you got for us?
There is no need to stay on the defense. Patrol the area.
Clan doesn't have any available heroes to lead the new party.
We have nothing - no silver, no wares.
Your opponent constructed a barrier against you, and you have fewer pawns left. You lost the game!
That'll do. For now, anyway. Travel safe - and I hope to see you again.[ib:closed][rf:convo_bemused]
Despite the hardship, you hear few murmurs of complaint, and people seem to trust their rulers to lead them through adversity.
Command simulated battles. Win battles at difficult odds. Escape from encounters by sacrificing troops if necessary.

Sure, I'll give you a tip. I spoke to some traders who say they just bought some {.%}{ITEM_NAME}{.%} from {SETTLEMENT} at a price of {BUY_COST}{GOLD_ICON} and sold at {DESTINATION} for {SELL_COST}{GOLD_ICON}.

Executing a prisoner will negatively affect your reputation and will decrease your relation with the prisoner's faction/clan.{newline}You will not be able to undo this action.{newline}Are you sure you want to execute this character?
Leadership of the formation has been given to {HERO_NAME}.
{CHILD.NAME} has reached the age of {CHILD.AGE} and {?CHILD.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} needs your guidance.
Here's what we've got: {ITEM_LIST}. Take them, but let us live.
Trader does not have enough money.
Mangonel{NEWLINE}Throws rocks over a distance using torsion strings.{NEWLINE}Equally effective against walls, enemy siege engines and their operators.
Defenders are still holding the keep.
While you were raiding {SETTLEMENT}, {PARTY} came to aid the village. You decided to...
Fire Mangonel{NEWLINE}Throws jars filled with Greek fire, combines the already deadly power of mangonels with fire.
There is no tournament currently in this town.
The village is of average wealth. Humans and animals alike look well-fed. Villagers busily attend to the tasks of the seasons.
On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, you unfurled the dragon banner and proclaimed your mission to {?PLAYER_WANTS_RESTORE}restore{?}defeat{\?} the Empire.
You are outside of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. You cannot enter because the castle belongs to the enemy.
Nice, {PLAYER.LINK}, nice. You managed to take down no less than {OPPONENT_COUNT} opponents. You were a crowd favorite, for your pluck. And of course, you earned a prize money of {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}.
You will lose {INFLUENCE_COST} influence if you abandon the army.
Other party is over their troops limit.{newline}They will temporarily keep their troops but after some time they will quickly abandon their party.{newline}Are you sure?
You hear much praise for the wisdom of the rulers who have achieved this prosperity.
Our plan is to form a defensive ring around our ranged troops.
Duel your opponent on foot for victory!
Afraid we'll need to make an example out of you, then. Don't bother begging for mercy.[ib:aggressive][if:convo_bared_teeth]
This will not save your game and return you the the Main Menu. Are you sure you want to exit?
On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, you found a third piece of the Dragon Banner. You are ready to unfurl it once again.
You hear few complaints and people seem to have confidence in the authorities.
If you proceed, {LEADER.NAME} will be the new leader of this party. Are you sure?
Boosting a project adds +{BOOST} construction and costs {COST} denars / day.
FOUL! No fighting outside of the joust. You have been disqualified!
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} are fighting enemy inside the walls.
Build and operate siege engines. Successfully use engines in sieges offensively or defensively.
We've heard what happened to others who refused to join your cause. We've no desire to end up like them and no means to fight you. We'll wear your colors from now until it pleases you no more.
I do not know where {?ASKED_LORD.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} is.
Well done, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. Keep the money and wine coming our way, and there's no foe in Calradia you need fear.[ib:convo_approving]
Be on your way. Safe journeys.
If you proceed, {GOVERNOR.NAME} will become the new governor of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Are you sure?
You can not annex a settlement until ownership decision is complete.

Heh! That's quite the bruise you're sporting. But don't worry; everybody gets trounced once in a while. The important thing is to pick yourself up, dust yourself off and keep fighting. That's what champions do.
You have arrived at {SETTLEMENT} to lay siege to it.
Make profit from trading. Operate caravans.
Fight with a two handed short weapon.
Greetings, traveller. Unless you wish your bones to be left in the sand to be gnawed upon by jackals, give us what we want.
Your relation is increased by {MAGNITUDE} to {VALUE} with {CLAN_LEADER}.
{PARTY} is leading the attack on the enemy. You'll be joining {?ARMY_COMMANDER_GENDER}her{?}him{\?} with your troops.

Bagh Chal is a game of Sheep (white) versus Wolves (black).{newline}The wolves have four pawns that start on the four corners of the board. Every turn, one sheep is placed on the board, and one wolf makes a move or capture until all sheep have been placed on the board.{newline}After all sheep have been placed, the sheep can now also move on the board.
Free Attribute Points: You can use these points to increase attributes. You'll gain one free attribute for every {ATTRIBUTE_EVERY_LEVEL} levels you gain.
There is no need to stay on the defense. Siege their settlements!
Can't manage the army during an encounter
We must hit hard and destroy their siege machines.
We shall stain the sands with your blood, then.
You have arrived at {SETTLEMENT} to raid it. Some of the residents have gathered to resist you.
The town is of average wealth.

A pawn may be moved orthogonally, one tile at a time.{newline}A pawn can not be moved back to the tile that it came from in the previous turn.{newline}If a player is unable to move, that player may remove one of the opponent's pawns and still make a move.

Once a party is disbanded, it merges into a near clan party or goes to nearest map faction settlement and joins its garrison.{newline}{newline}You will not be able to undo / cancel this action.{newline}{newline}Are you sure?
Remaining Days With Food: {REMAINING_DAYS}{newline}{newline}Total Food: {TOTAL_FOOD_AMOUNT}{newline}Daily Consumption: {DAILY_FOOD_CONSUMPTION}
This item is {PERCENTAGE}% more expensive than average
Run along now, little sheep. And be careful of the other wolfpacks out there.
Some of the angry villagers say that they have recently satisfied your demands. It looks like you'll have a fight on your hands if you continue.
Our allies need help. Lift the siege!
Spend your own influence to increase the influence of the selected clan
This hero is already an alley leader.
So kind you are, not sending us home empty-handed.
The town is clearly going through hard times. People look malnourished and buildings are poorly maintained.
Slaughter{newline}You will not be able to undo this action.
You can only disband mobile parties
Your vassals will be more inclined to take offensive actions against this enemy such as raids and sieges.
Can't access banner window right now!
You arrived just in the nick of time! {PLAYER.LINK}. You have my deepest thanks!
Are you sure? You won't be able to undo this action.
Our plan is to attack with full force around our infantry.
FOUL! Your opponent hit your horse. {?OPPONENT_GENDER}He{?}She{\?} has been disqualified!
You cannot expel your own clan.
What have we here? Looks like the mountain spirits have answered our prayers, and granted us success in the hunt.

You can only move a pawn that has an opposing pawn next to it, to the center tile.{newline}Every pawn can freely be moved one tile along the outer edge.{newline}A pawn on the center tile can move to any available tile.
There is already another clan with this name.
You have won the duel. Your army is encouraged by this display of your might. Your party gains morale.
You have received {AMOUNT} {DAMAGE_TYPE} damage from {ATTACKER_NAME} ({LOST_HP_PERCENTAGE}% HP).
Here's our money: {MONEY}{GOLD_ICON}. And here's our wares: {ITEM_LIST}. Just take them and let us live, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}.
People openly curse the authorities, as though they feel they have nothing to lose.

The Battanians still remember the olden days when the woods stretched across northern Calradia, and the Empire and its cities had yet to violate their sanctity. The fierce warriors remain loyal to their traditional ways. They paint their faces when going to battle and even their noblemen prefer to fight on foot while using great axes and two-handed swords with deadly efficiency.

Capture your opponent's pawns by surrounding them on both sides. If a pawn moves in between two opposing pawns, it does not get captured.{newline}In the first two images, white pawns get captured by the black pawns. In the last two, there are no captures.
As you wish. From now on, we fight for you.
Your opponent has bested you. You've lost.
Fight with a spear or similiar polearm, either one-handed or two handed.
It will be automatically resolved in {HOUR} hours.
Our plan is to crush them with our cavalry and sweep the rest with a follow up attack.
There's a toll for passin' through this land, payable to us, so if you don't mind we'll just be collectin' our due from your purse...
Good, good. I much prefer a straight-up deal to rummaging through your gut afterward to see what you might have hid there.[ib:hip][rf:convo_bemused]
There is no effect on decision making.

You are outside of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. You are not allowed inside. Usually when you approach an enemy city the roads are deserted. This time, however, you pass some onlookers, and even hear the occasional cheer. You suspect that few among the population are loyal to the {FACTION_INFORMAL_NAME}, and that the militia is unlikely to take up arms in the city's defense.
Friendly troops are fleeing. You've lost the battle.
Critical Fail and Fail Whole Persuasion Chance
I got captured, but later managed to escape
Gather your troops and prepare for battle!
Increasing {ATTRIBUTE_NAME} makes it easier to learn bound skills and also raises their learning limit.
You can not perform this action while you are in an encounter
{PRISONER.NAME} has been released after {?PRISONER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} ransom was paid.
Are you sure you want to abdicate leadership?{?WILL_DESTROY}{newline}There are no other clans to take leadership. Your kingdom will be destroyed.{?}{\?}
Well well, look at this! You'd best start coughing up some silver, friend, or me and my boys'll have to break you.
Siege Tower{NEWLINE}Used for getting on to the walls. Better than just ladders

You put up quite a good fight there. Some very good moves. A few errors, sure, but you definitely show promise. And you earned a prize of {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON} for knocking down {OPPONENT_COUNT} opponents.
There is already a proposed decision for this policy.
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} are charging at {?IS_PLURAL}different enemy formations{?}an enemy formation{\?}.
You have inflicted {AMOUNT} {DAMAGE_TYPE} damage to {VICTIM_NAME} ({LOST_HP_PERCENTAGE}% HP).
On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, the conspiracy against the Empire succeeded in uniting its foes, as the armies of {FACTION_NAMES} took the field together.
If you proceed, the party will be without a leader for {TRAVEL_DURATION} while your clan members travel. It will not be able to join any armies until its new leader arrives. Are you sure?

Siege Tower
{NEWLINE}Brings the attackers to the same height as the wall and evens the odds against defenders.
After this troop gains {XP_AMOUNT} xp, one more troop will be available for upgrade
This party will grow in size. It's current size target is {TARGET_SIZE}
{HERO.LINK} gained {?PLURAL}{GAINED_POINTS} skill points{?}a skill point{\?} in {SKILL_NAME} and is now {UPDATED_SKILL_LEVEL}.
Fight on foot. Move on map on foot.
{ASKED_LORD.LINK} is in the field and {?ASKED_LORD.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} should be close to {SETTLEMENT_NAME} at the moment.
Only wolves can capture, by jumping over a sheep to an available tile behind it. Capturing also follows the lines on the board.
That was fine fighting, {PLAYER.LINK}. You took down {OPPONENT_COUNT} opponents. Of course you deserve a prize with that performance: {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}. Nice, eh?

Rumour has it the {ITEM_NAME} around here sells for cheaper than in other towns. If you were to buy some here and take it to {TOWN_NAME}, where it fetches a higher price, you could probably make around {PRICE_DIFF}{GOLD_ICON} of profit per item.

The starting player chooses one of four pawns to be removed from the board.{newline}Then, the other player selects one of his adjacant pawns to also be removed. If the pawn of the starting player was in the center, the other player has to remove one of two pawns in the center too.{newline}{newline}The game now begins.
You're a lord and voting. The ruler will vote in the end and decide the outcome.
You! Stop! Give us your silver. We're not playing games.[if:convo_angry]
You cannot manage your army while in battle
Shoot enemies with a bow and arrows. Perform difficult shots from a long distance.
You are outside {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. You see the banner of {LORD.LINK} flying over the castle gate.
The defenders have pulled back and are mounting a last stand inside the keep.
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} are moving into missile range.
You have been knocked unconscious and your opponent is granted victory!
Fire Ballista{NEWLINE}Shoots bolts with tips dipped in tar.{NEWLINE}They will deal fire damage to enemy siege engines and wooden structures as well as being deadly against soldiers.
If you wager 100 and win, you will get {NORMALIZED_EXPECTED_GOLD}
Changes you made cannot be applied. Do you want to reset and change the screen?
Ah, I'm afraid we'll have to cut your throat then - on principle, of course. For trespassing.
There is no need for us to stay here. Let's go!
Clan Does Not Own Any Fiefs
The tournament will be a joust.
I was wounded and left for dead
Bring forward the proposal to give this settlement to someone else
The skills that are bound to ({ATTRIBUTE_NAME}) attribute are:
{CLAN} has gained {AMOUNT_TO_ADD} renown. New renown is {NEW_RENOWN}.
During battles, holding down {MISSION_INDICATORS_KEY} shows markers on enemy and allied formations.
On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, you pledged allegiance to {RULER.NAME}, hoping that {?RULER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} will lead the fight to {?PLAYER_WANTS_RESTORE}restore{?}defeat{\?} the Empire.
The village is prosperous. Brimming sacks of grain, healthy animals and loaded carts testify to the bounty of the fields.
Clan name needs to be between {MIN} - {MAX} characters.
You have encountered {PARTY}. They have no chance against your overwhelming power, and they surrender.
Can't access character window right now!
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} are trying to retake {#IS_LEFT}{#}right wall{#}walls on multiple sides{\#}{?IS_MIDDLE}middle wall{?}{\?}{?IS_RIGHT}left wall{?}{\?}.
You've constructed a barrier against your opponent, but you have an equal amount of pawns left. The game is a draw!
Can be slaughtered for meat and hide

Pawns can move to any tile in a vertical or horizontal direction, but they can never jump over other pawns.{newline}Pawns can not move on or over the center tile. Once the king leaves this tile, he can also no longer cross it.
{PRISONER.NAME} has been released from captivity following a peace treaty.
You are outside of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. You are not allowed inside.
Here is {MONEY}{GOLD_ICON}. Just take it and let us go.
{PRISONER.NAME} has escaped from {?PRISONER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} place of captivity.
As you attempt to force the notables to give you recruits, some of the residents gather to resist you.
You still have a chance to win. Do you want to forfeit?
You can not perform this action while raiding a village
Your help was most welcome stranger. My name is {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}. Can I learn yours?
Be on your way, little fly.
Stop right there. This is a robbery.[if:convo_aggressive]
On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, a child was born to {FATHER_NAME} and {MOTHER_NAME}.
I was knocked senseless by the enemy
This item is {PERCENTAGE}% cheaper than average
Battle ended! Press tab key to leave...
You gained 1 point for the hit!
You can't join armies within the duration of safe passage.
You bet {BET_AMOUNT} on yourself and you won the fight. Here is your reward {REWARD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}.
Are you sure to retreat your party?
You can wager gold to increase the prize you take. Every round, the odds will be different and you can wager {MAX_AMOUNT} each time.
Are you sure you want to cancel?

Sturgians are the descendants of the foreign tribes of northern Calradia. As the empire expanded into their cold forests, they found a ready market for the luxurious furs of woodland animals whom they traditionally hunted and trapped. Sturgian chieftains became princes, vying for pre-eminence with the help of Nord mercenaries who migrated into their realm. They are good hunters and wanderers, travelling far in search of opportunities both for trade and for plunder.
You have acted wisely and with respect. You may go.
Improve relations with people. Socialize with nobles. Do Barters.
You've been killed by a stray {MOUNT_NAME}!
You're the commander. You will be able to order all formations during the battle.

The Khuzait confederation of steppe tribes used to live a nomadic life, but have recently settled in the eastern frontier of the Empire and are slowly transitioning into an agrarian society with permanent town centers. Despite this, they still retain many aspects of their nomadic life, including their affinity with horses. They are masters of mounted archery, shooting and then galloping out of reach.
Do you want to skip current match?
Your champion has lost the duel. Your army is disheartened by this defeat. Your party loses morale.
Well met indeed {PLAYER.LINK}. My name is {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} and I am forever in your debt. If there is ever anything I can help you with, just let me know...
{PARTY} has gained {AMOUNT_TO_ADD} renown. {CLAN}'s new renown is {NEW_RENOWN}.
Cannot kick a companion who is solving an issue.
If you proceed, selected clan members will start traveling and they will not be available until they arrive {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Are you sure?
Can't access party screen right now!
Are you sure you want to exit multiplayer?
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} are waiting for other siege machines to arrive.
Gain party morale from food variety (Quartermaster). Improve settlement prosperity and build projects (Governor).
{PRISONER.NAME} has been freed after {?PRISONER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} captors were defeated in battle.
Again you save our necks, {PLAYER.LINK}! Truly, you are the best of friends.
You cannot expel a ruling clan.
Cannot kick main hero from clan.
On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, you found the artifact which Tacteos mentioned.
Spot tracks and hideouts. Travel through difficult terrain. (Scout)
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} are shooting from the castle walls.
This action is not allowed in current stage of the story.
You're over your prisoners limit.{newline}You will temporarily keep your prisoners but after some time they will quickly escape your party. You will also slow down.{newline}Are you sure?
Propose to expel this clan from the kingdom ({SUPPORT}%)
Sorry, I don't know of any good trading tips at present.

The Calradian Empire is in decline. Even before the suspicious death of the Emperor Arenicos, the once united realm was torn by political rivalries. Today, those factions are in open war. Yet Calradians endure. Their methodical study of defensive strategy, in which garrison cities slow down invading forces until mobile field armies can come to their rescue, helps hold their neighbors at bay.
Clan doesn't have any empty party slots.
The tournament will be a horse race.
Clan Does Not Have Any Additional Incomes
Your troops will gain {XP_AMOUNT} experience for donating weapons and/or armor depending on your perks. They can gain maximum of {XP_DONATION_LIMIT} experience.
Your opponent constructed a barrier against you, but you have more pawns left. You win the game!
Battle lost. Press {leave_key} to view results.
You will slow down dramatically. Be careful.
Today's not your lucky day, friend. How about you hand over your silver? Be a real shame to have to cut anyone's throat.[if:convo_mocking_revenge]
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} are defending a siege weapon.
You lost {INFLUENCE} influence for abandoning a defensive siege of your kingdom.
Well met {PLAYER.LINK}. I am {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK}. Thanks for your help and I hope we meet again.
Maintain high morale in your party. Assemble and lead armies. Upgrade your troops.
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} are defending key positions of the castle.
You see people gathering in the village to resist you. What do you want to do?
Good! Good! Now go! Go away![ib:aggressive][if:convo_angry]
You don't have enough materials for this.
The villagers here are few and frightened, and they quickly scatter and run before you. The village is at your mercy.
The joust is over and your opponent has bested you this day...
Stop there - easy now. The great eternal sky has given these lands to us. No one passes through here without our permission.
Greetings, traveler. Welcome to our forest. We're going to have to collect a small toll.[rf:convo_mocking_revenge]
Hello, traveler. Hope you brought your purse. See, we're what you might call brigands, and I'm afraid we can't let you pass without paying us a bit of coin.[if:convo_mocking_revenge]
Very well - we shall cleanse this land with your blood.

The Aserai are the inhabitants of the Nahasa desert, a mixture of nomadic bedouin and settled oasis farmers. They are famous for their horsemanship and their knowledge of the learning of many lands, especially medicine, gained from lying on some of the continent's most lucrative trade routes. Each clan is fiercely proud of its lineage and often jealous of the others, but when united by a charismatic leader, they become a major force in the south.
Our plan is to fall back in formation to fight another day.
You will not be dissapointed {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. You will not find better warriors in all Calradia.[ib:convo_approving]

You are outside of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. You cannot enter because the castle belongs to the enemy. Usually when you approach an enemy city the roads are deserted. This time, however, you pass some onlookers, and even hear the occasional cheer. You suspect that few among the population are loyal to the {FACTION_INFORMAL_NAME}, and that the militia is unlikely to take up arms in the castle's defense.

When a stack lands exactly on its home-tile, all pawns of the player who controls the stack are returned to that player's hand, and can be re-used. The pawns belonging to the other player are eliminated from the game.
You caused trouble on my territory... I didn't care for that.
You cannot make any moves. Skipping turn.
Safe journeys! Don't let yourself get robbed by anyone but us!
You will be over troop limit. This can negatively affect your party morale.
Your unit is expected to: {BEHAVIOUR_NAME_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{BEHAVIOUR_NAME_END}
This item's cost is near it's average price
All right. So how much do you value your life?[ib:hip][if:convo_bared_teeth]
If auto recruitment is enabled, the garrison will recruit troops from notables in the town center and nearby villages. The costs will be paid by the settlement owner.
Yet the prosperity is clearly not benefiting everyone equally. People seem angry, complaining endlessly about new rural migrants, rising prices, and those who are profiting more than others.
Nobody in your party has enough {SKILL} skill to complete this order. (Need {AMOUNT} more)
You need to select an outcome and how much you want to support that outcome.
{ITEM_NAME}, won by {COMPANION.LINK} has been added to your inventory.
You need to be the leader of an army to manage it
Wolves and sheep move in the same way by sliding along the lines on the board, one tile per turn.
Make it worth our while not to kill you.
Can't access kingdom window right now!
Wait for your opponent to get into position

If you can beat {OPPONENT_COUNT_1} opponents before going down, you'll earn {PRIZE_1}{GOLD_ICON}. You'll get {PRIZE_2}{GOLD_ICON} for striking down at least {OPPONENT_COUNT_2} opponents, {PRIZE_3}{GOLD_ICON} if you can defeat {OPPONENT_COUNT_3} opponents, and {PRIZE_4}{GOLD_ICON} if you can survive long enough to beat {OPPONENT_COUNT_4} opponents. If you can manage to be the last fighter standing, you'll earn the great prize of the fights, {PRIZE_5}{GOLD_ICON}. Sounds good, eh?[if:convo_nonchalant]
There is already another kingdom with this name.
Move to screen us against foes moving behind our back
Your men have just join your party
Hello there, little lost sheep. We are wolves of the mountains, and we would like a moment of your time...[rf:convo_mocking_revenge]
The following heroes can craft this weapon:
You have voted and the ruler has decided on the outcome.
This party will NOT grow or shrink in size. It will try to keep it's size as it is.
Raiding, attacking parties and sieging have a higher weight in decisions. The party will pursue enemies farther.
Ride forth and attempt to strike your opponent!
You don't have a high enough relation to acquire this troop. {newline}You have {REL1}. You need {REL2}.
There are bandits inside this place. Do you want to attack them?
You bet {BET_AMOUNT} on yourself but you have been defeated.
You cannot disband an army while it's in a map event.
Halt! Your foreign feet on this sacred land offend our ancestors. What are we going to do about that?[rf:convo_mocking_revenge]
If you proceed, you will remove {GOVERNOR.NAME} from being the governor of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Are you sure?
Moving pawns is only possible by capturing pawns from your opponent.{newline}Capturing is done by orthoginally jumping over 1 or more opposing pawns.
Can't access clan window right now!
Defy us, will you? We'll drink from your skull!
The enemy is organizing. Consider a tactical retreat soon.
You are trapped by enemies. You are not in no condition to fight. Your only option is to surrender.
On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, the secret pact between the imperial factions was revealed, as the armies of the former rivals took the field together.
The tournament will be a melee group fight.

A pawn that lands on a tile with an opposing pawn already there, will capture that opposing pawn. The captured pawn will be stacked underneath the invading pawn.{newline}A stack of pawns can be also be re-captured as long as the top pawn belongs to the opponent.{newline}As soon as a pawn makes a capture, it will move back towards its home-tile in the next turn.
You have destroyed all enemy siege engines! It is time to retreat to the castle.
You cannot disband an army while you're in that army.
Battle finished. Press {leave_key} to view results
You have rejected a challenge to a duel. Your army is disheartened by this display of cowardice. Your party loses morale.
Can't access inventory in a battle!
Can't manage the army during a siege
Our plan is to remain on the defensive.
So how much are you going to give us?[rf:convo_angry]

Ha! Nothing like a good jab in the gut to let you know you're alive, eh? Looks like you managed to take down {OPPONENT_COUNT} opponents. Not bad. But that won't bring you any prize money. Now, if I were you, I would go back there and show everyone what I can do...
As you attempt to force the villagers to give you goods, some of the residents gather to resist you. Fighting them will cause a war with the {KINGDOM}.
Rebels are attacking this settlement. Do you want to interfere?
Raid caravans. Recruit and lead bandit troops. Infiltrate enemy towns. Give bribes. Escape from captivity.
We are taking our products to the market at {TOWN}.
You have been awarded the right to carry a banner. Your banner will signify your status and bring you honour. Which banner do you want to choose?
The tournament has ended. {TOURNAMENT_FINAL_PARTICIPANT_A} wins by beating {TOURNAMENT_FINAL_PARTICIPANT_B} in the final round.
This party will shrink in size. It's current size target is {TARGET_SIZE}
The village is going through hard times. Farm tools are rusty and broken. Brush and weeds are reclaiming the outermost fields.

If you proceed, {GOVERNOR.NAME} will travel for {TRAVEL_DURATION} to become the new governor of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. While traveling, {GOVERNOR.NAME} will not be available and you will not be able to change the governor of {SETTLEMENT_NAME} until {GOVERNOR.NAME} arrives. Are you sure?
Now out of my sight, you mangy cringing cur!
Stop there you dog! Show us what you've got!
You've beaten your opponent and won the game!
You have sworn not to attack.
Help wounded soldiers heal in settlements.
{BUILDING_NAME} building in {SETTLEMENT_NAME} has gained a level.
Despite the poverty, you hear few words of complaint, as though people are too beaten down to expect any change.
Your captains are ordering a tactical retreat!
Aye, what have we here? There's a tax for passage in these parts, traveler, paid either in coin or in blood.[if:convo_bared_teeth]
This page explains the game concepts in Bannerlord
{ISSUE_NAME}: Your troops are resolving this problem.
Battle won. Press {leave_key} to view results
Gather your men, we have another job to do!
So you intend to fight, little sheep? Let's see your horns then.
You are trapped by enemies. But your men are in no condition to fight. Your only option is to surrender.
Congratulations, champion! Your fight there was something to remember! As the last one standing, you of course win the top prize: {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}.
{ABSORBED_AMOUNT} damage has been absorbed by {ARMOR_AMOUNT} armor.
You have lost the duel. Your army is disheartened by your defeat. Your party loses morale.
Hero's {SKILL_NAME} skill needs to be {MIN_SKILL_AMOUNT} or higher.
A hot day, is it not? Don't tire yourself fighting. Give us what we want and we'll leave.[rf:convo_mocking_revenge]
Good. Now be careful out there. World's full of thieves, not all of them as kind as we are.[ib:closed][rf:convo_bemused]
You have our permission to proceed with your journey.
+{BONUS_AMOUNT}% bonus to siege engine production speed
You're the ruler. Your decision will be the final one and will overrule anything.
You need to be a part of a Kingdom
You bet {BET_AMOUNT} on {FIGHTER_NAME} but {?FIGHTER_GENDER}she{?}he{\?} has been defeated.
The town is prosperous. The people look well-fed and relatively comfortable.
{ISSUE_NAME}: Your troops have resolved the matter and have returned from their mission.
You could not pay all wages, your party loses {reg1} morale.
The force besieging {SETTLEMENT} has begun its assault!
You hear some complaints about prices, shortages and greedy merchants, but no more than normal.
Your vassals will be more inclined to take defensive actions against this enemy such as responding to enemy raids and sieges.
Some of the angry villagers grab their tools and prepare to resist you. It looks like you'll have a fight on your hands if you continue.
You're over your troops limit.{newline}You will temporarily keep your troops but after some time they will quickly abandon your party. You will also slow down.{newline}Are you sure?
You have arrived at {SETTLEMENT} to help defend the settlement from attackers.
Improved Battering Ram{NEWLINE}Used for breaking the gates. Better than the normal one.
Perhaps you and I can make a deal.
The tournament has ended. {TOURNAMENT_FINAL_OPPONENT} wins by beating you in the final round.
Hear that whistling and howling? That's not the wind - it's the ghosts of those who defied us. Prepare to join them.
Your opponent constructed a barrier against you, but you have an equal amount of pawns left. The game is a draw!
Your champion has won the duel. Your army is encouraged by this victory. Your party gains morale.
Additional Party Size for every party in the clan
There is a better target. We should go there.
Good. Now be on your way. Don't forget to drink lots of water!
You have made changes. Do you want to apply them?
This hero is clearing a common area.
This hero is busy with an issue or a quest.
You can use free focus points for increasing your learning limit in individual skills. Characters earn {FOCUS_PER_LEVEL} focus point every time they level up.
Hey - you. What you got in your bags? What are you carrying?[if:convo_bared_teeth]
You've scored {CURRENT_PROGRESS} points out of the {TARGET_PROGRESS} needed to succeed in this persuasion attempt.
Hero's {TRAIT_NAME} trait needs to be {MAX_TRAIT_AMOUNT} or lower.
Can't gather an army during an encounter
Two pawns from each player start on the board as shown. Players take turns placing the rest on any available tile, excluding the center tile.

This region is gripped by civil disorder, yet people must still go about their daily chores. For the most part, they not linger long in the markets or make eye contact. But you overhear hushed conversations about the rebels in the countryside. Some seem to be afraid of the rebels, others secretly thrilled that the tables have turned, even for a little while, on the rich and powerful.
Your opponent has been knocked unconscious and you are the winner!
{HERO} doesn't have enough {SKILL} skill to craft this weapon.
The Dragon Banner stands tall once again.
We should choose our next object.
Battering Ram{NEWLINE}Used for breaking the gates. Better than just ladders
On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, a realm fell. The {FORMAL_NAME} is no more.
Ride on the map with as much speed as possible. Fight on horseback gaining speed bonus.
Oh, indeed we can, indeed we can. Provided you have a fat purse and are ready to lighten it, of course.[ib:hip][rf:convo_bemused]
Enemy troops are falling back to the castle.
You win the tournament by beating {TOURNAMENT_FINAL_OPPONENT} in the final round.
Enemy destroyed all of our siege engines!
You've constructed a barrier against your opponent, and have more pawns left. You win the game!
A fly that wiggles and struggles a bit - we can handle that..
Upon selection, this option will block one random option.
Fight with a one handed short weapon.
Duel has ended. Hold {leave_key} to leave.
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} are doing hit and run.
We were separated in the heat of battle
You have encountered {PARTY}. Fighting them will cause a war with the {KINGDOM}.
Really? I suppose I'll be getting my hands dirty today, then.[ib:aggressive][if:convo_bared_teeth]
You come across a battle between {ATTACKER} and {DEFENDER}
Your relation is increased by {MAGNITUDE} to {VALUE} with {HERO.NAME}.
Join the battle without leading any men.
Well met {PLAYER.LINK}. I am in your debt for what you just did. I hope one day I will find a way to repay it.
Encumbrance{newline}Total equipped armor and weapon weight.{newline}High encumbrance will slow down your on foot movement speed.
This hero can not craft this item.
Your opponent wants to forfeit. Do you accept your win? If you don't, you will continue playing.
Splendid. See, my lads and I, we're not cruel men. A bit greedy though, that can't be denied, so do be generous.[ib:hip][rf:convo_bemused]
I was taken and held for ransom
You are discarding items. Are you sure?
This hero does not have required {SKILL} skill to complete this order.
Congratulations! You have triumphed over your opponent!
Heard you got into a fight with some of the people working for {COMMON_AREA_OWNER}. Well, that's no business of mine.
We must rush to defend our siege machines lest the enemy destroy them.
You have gained {INFLUENCE} influence. New influence is {NEW_INFLUENCE}.
A magisterial performance, {PLAYER.LINK}. Whack! Crack! You took down {OPPONENT_COUNT} of them. The crowd loved it. And you earned a prize of {PRIZE}{GOLD_ICON}.
You cannot annex a ruling clan's settlement.
Enemies are fleeing. You won the battle.
You need to be in a kingdom
You bet {BET_AMOUNT} on {FIGHTER_NAME} and {?FIGHTER_GENDER}she{?}he{\?} won the fight. Here is your reward {REWARD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}.
You are outside {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. Your banner flies over the castle gate.
Completed quests in the last year
Well there, traveller. We've just made landfall in these lands, hoping for a bit of luck with the raiding and pillaging, and aren't you a sight for sore eyes?[rf:convo_mocking_revenge]
On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, a child was born to {MOTHER_NAME}.
Our plan is to get in range and shower them with arrows.
Currently nobody is willing to be recruited in this town.
Use smithy to create weapons, refine materials and smelt old weapons.
Do you want to resolve {DECISION_NAME} decision?
You turned up just in time, {PLAYER.LINK}. I will not forget your help.
We must defend the walls and not let the enemy inside.
A new troop will be available here after some time.
Your opponent gained 1 point for the hit!
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} are shooting from the siege tower.
Well, I'm glad you respect our ancient and sacred privileges.
The defenders win when they can move their king to any edge of the board.{newline}The attackers win when they capture the king, or if they can prevent all defenders from moving.
You cannot give anymore focus points to this skill
Well then... It was a long voyage, so do dig deep into your purse.
I don't think we have met properly my friend. You just saved my life out there, and I still don't know your name...

A player wins if his opponent has only one or no pawns left.{newline}{newline}Another way to win is by constructing a barrier that has all of the pawns of the opposing player on one side. When a barrier has been constructed, the player with the most pawns left wins.
We should patrol this area for a while.
It would take {TRAVEL_DURATION} for {HERO_NAME} to arrive at your party. Do you want to proceed?
Can't gather an army during a siege
Cannot execute hero during a battle
Your opponent cannot make any moves. Skipping turn.
Upon selection, this option will progress the persuasion attempt to the next stage.
Nice! No more sleeping on hard cold rock and dining on stringy squirrel.
The starting player and the amount of tiles you can move each turn are decided by throwing four two-coloured sticks.
Rebels in {SETTLEMENT} have risen against their lord, {RULER}.
I have not found any profitable trades recently.
The jackals will feed well tonight, then.
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} are forming a defensive ring around ranged troops.
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} are shooting from infantry cover.
You've been in prison at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.
Your relation is decreased by {MAGNITUDE} to {VALUE} with {HERO.NAME}.
On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, {LEADER_NAME} declared the creation of a new realm, the {KINGDOM_NAME}.
We'll take it. You can live. Now go before I change my mind.[ib:closed][if:convo_normal]
Your relation is decreased by {MAGNITUDE} to {VALUE} with {CLAN_LEADER}.
{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} are forming a skirmish line.
We are at your service, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. Point us in the direction of those who need hurting, and we'll do the rest.[ib:convo_approving]
You're leaving hard earned, free loot behind! Are you sure?
Show recent events in this war
Are you sure you want to surrender? All of your troops will be lost!
You need to select an outcome.
As you attempt to force the notables to give you recruits, some of the residents gather to resist you. Fighting them will cause a war with the {KINGDOM}.
Thanks for your help, stranger. We haven't met properly yet, have we? What is your name?
On {DAY_OF_YEAR}, {YEAR}, you found a second piece of the Dragon Banner of Calradios.
The tournament has ended. {TOURNAMENT_FINAL_PARTICIPANT_A} wins by beating {TOURNAMENT_FINAL_PARTICIPANT_B} in the final round. You were eliminated at round {TOURNAMENT_ELIMINATED_ROUND}.

Tablut is a game of attackers (black) versus defenders (white).{newline}The attackers outnumber the defenders, but the defenders don't have to capture to win. Their main objective is to secure their king (center pawn).{newline}The king follows the same movement and capturing rules as the other pawns.
A player wins if his opponent has been blocked and can no longer make any moves.
You've been held prisoner for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?} by {PARTY_NAME}.
You cannot disband a milita party
Can't retreat, there are enemies nearby!
Trader doesn't have enough money! Are you sure?
You cannot support your own clan.
You cannot disband a garrison party
We are returning from the market at {TOWN} back to our village.
The tournament will be an archery contest.
Faction name needs to be between {MIN} - {MAX} characters.
The wolves win if they can remove 5 sheep from the board.{newline}{newline}The sheep win if they can block the wolves so they can't make any more moves.

The Vlandians are the descendants of adventurers from the west who lived under the Empire for centuries before forming an independent kingdom. With the decline of imperial authority, they have evolved into a well organised feudal society led by a caste of warlike nobles who prefer to fight with spears and lances on horseback.
Ballista{NEWLINE}Shoots bolts at deadly effect. Effective against soldiers.
You are outside the town of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}. You cannot enter because you are wanted by the {FACTION_TERM}.
Defending settlements has a higher weight in decisions. The party will also pursue enemies for a shorter distance.
That's the spirit... We're a band of bastards that you really don't want to mess with.[rf:convo_bemused]
You cannot gather an army while in battle
Mostly people are content, although you hear some complaints about rising prices, the unequal distribution of wealth, and migrants coming from the countryside.
You shall be slain, then. Ready yourself.
You have sallied out to attack {PARTY}.
You have arrived at {SETTLEMENT} to raid it. You do not meet any resistance. Raiding this village will cause a war with the {KINGDOM}.
A player wins if his opponent has no more available pawns in hand or on the board.
